## cache package

|  Class | Description |

|  [LRUCache](./cache.lrucache.md) |  |
|  [MRUCache](./cache.mrucache.md) |  |
|  [TLRUCache](./cache.tlrucache.md) | Time-aware LRU cache. Extends LRU strategy with TTL (time-to-live) values associated to each entry. <code>has()</code> will only return true and <code>get()</code> only returns a cached value if its TTL hasn't yet expired. When adding a new value to the cache, first removes expired entries and if still not sufficient space then removes entries in LRU order. <code>set()</code> takes an optional entry specific <code>ttl</code> arg. If not given, uses the cache instance's default (provided via ctor option arg). If no instance TTL is given, TTL defaults to 1 hour. |
